text: Anyone used HubSpot as a headless CMS?

Hi,

Im trying to access all events registered in the organisation, through this endpoint :
uri = f'<https://api.hubapi.com/email/public/v1/events>?'

I have made sure that the Oauth access token has the business-intelligence scope, however I still get the following error message :
'{"status":"error","message":"This hapikey does not have proper permissions! (requires all of [event-analytics-api-access])"

The organisation has a HubSpot Professional account. Is it true that the only thing missing for me to access the events is a HubSpot Enterprise account ? <#C2YHAHB6K|api> #events

Hello All!
While migrating data to HubSpot we need to associate tickets with company. When there are over 10000 tickets that should be associated with single company we receive the error.
Here is a sample of the request and response
Request
PUT <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/tickets/966960690/associations/companies/8963354902>
Response
“body”: {
“status”: “error”,
“message”: “One or more associations are invalid”,
“correlationId”: “37d2563c-8810-4c41-a014-06673848f207”,
“context”: {
“ASSOCIATION_LIMIT_EXCEEDED”: [
“Exceeded association limit of 10000 for portalId 7855102, fromObjectId 8963354902, associationType COMPANY_TO_TICKET_UNLABELED”
]
},
“category”: “VALIDATION_ERROR”
}

Can this be solved in any way? Or are there any workarounds, so I can associate more than 10K of tickets with the same company?

Hi all, My devs are have ran into an issue with connecting to the API

> We have an issue where we cannot get the HubSpot ruby code to run in AWS their new lib has a dependency that is not accessible there. We are looking into whether we can solve for that otherwise we will discuss alternative options
Has anyone experienced this?

Hello, we are trying to integrate our own api with HubSpot CRM API.
We have 2 questions:

1. Everytime we insert a contact the response of the `POST` seems to be bad but actually it insert it well.

Existing ID: 3930701\",\"correlationId\":\"758a3643-0d0d-45ff-907a-f9fe47d3363d\",\"category\":\"CONFLICT\"}\n"}```
2. Multiple-Line Text Data type, does nos understands what a list means. We are trying to pass a list and it is not recognizing the datatype

Hi all, Need support building Google API for Address Validation into a HubSpot form (and possibly CRM UI). DM me if you're keen to explore the project.
